name: helping hand (itch) (Happy Doggo)
description:
funny puzzle game with 4 difficulty levels

to select the levels, type in 1, 2, 3 or 4

to go to the menu, type 'menu'

everything else should be pretty clear (figure out the word in the puzzle)

if you like the game please donate or share my games so I can make many more =)

or donate here!

http://ko-fi.com/sofinaydenova

<3
